column5: My place is close to NRG Stadium/Houston. Youâ€™ll love my place because of 35 Miles from NRG Stadium. It is available in time for a corporate retreat of up to 13-15 guests for Superbowl Sunday Feb 5th. Rent 5 days and enjoy 1 day free. You'll be a short Uber/Taxi/Limo to the Big Game. You'll love the immense space to host a corporate party indoors and outdoors on a beautiful deck, days leading up to the game and even after. You'll also love the location and the ambience.
